basics.name: Ursula Nichols
basics.label: Digital Solutions Specialist
basics.summary: Results-driven digital solutions professional with experience in technical support, digital communications, and system maintenance. Proven success in streamlining processes and enhancing user experiences through innovative solutions. Adept at collaboration and committed to environmental sustainability.

work.summary: Part-time hybrid role supporting innovative low-power computing solutions for fishing vessels and marine conservation applications.
highlights: Design, implement, and optimize low-power Edge computing solutions for marine environments, contributing to grant applications and conducting testing of emerging technologies.

work.summary: Oversee daily operations, delivered outstanding customer service, and trained new hires, ensuring efficiency and quality in a high-paced environment.
highlights: Employed back and front of house functions, staff training, and customer service to ensure smooth daily operations.

work.company: University of Hawaiʻi Information Technology Services
work.summary: Provided technical support for students and faculty, troubleshooting software, hardware, and networking issues with a focus on excellent customer service.
highlights: Successfully diagnosed and resolved complex technical issues to ensure seamless IT support for end users.

work.company: University of Hawaiʻi School of Life Sciences
work.summary: Remote role enhancing web content and managing digital communications, ensuring up-to-date information and user-friendly online experiences.
highlights: Troubleshot web issues and updated site content to optimize user experience and digital accessibility.

work.summary: Remote role utilizing technical skills in web development and email management to support startup management.
highlights: Developed and implemented an email organization system using ClaudePost and Google Apps Script, significantly improving communication efficiency for client.

volunteer.summary: Coordinated community outreach events focused on public safety and engagement, bringing together resources and volunteers to create impactful experiences.
